lead_paragraph: A front-page article on Oct. 21 about the evolving American strategy for the war in Afghanistan misstated the number of Soviet soldiers wounded during the 10-year Soviet occupation of Afghanistan that ended in 1989. It was some 50,000, according to the Russian government, not hundreds of thousands.
abstract: Correction of Oct 21 article about evolving American strategy for war in Afghanistan
